configuration.bnd:
Bundle-Category: newAssignment
# export all versioned packages except for conditional ones (https://github.com/bndtools/bnd/issues/3721#issuecomment-579026778) -exportcontents: ${removeall;${packages;VERSIONED};${packages;CONDITIONAL}}
# reproducible builds (https://github.com/bndtools/bnd/issues/3521) -noextraheaders: true -snapshot: SNAPSHOT
Bundle-DocURL: -plugin org.apache.sling.caconfig.bndplugin.ConfigurationClassScannerPlugin -plugin org.apache.sling.bnd.models.ModelsScannerPlugin

requireJavaVersion.message: Maven must be executed with a Java 8 JRE or higher.

project.name: newAssignment - Repository Structure Package
project.description: Empty package that defines the structure of the Adobe Experience Manager repository the Code packages in this project deploy into. Any roots in the Code packages of this project should have their parent enumerated in the Filters list below.

configuration.bnd:
Bundle-Category: newAssignment
